cardsConfig.description: Troubleshooting tools to assist with supporting the application and end users.
A set of tools to manage user access and permissions.
Provides a seamless and efficient interface for administrators to manage and customize various aspects of the application.
Provides a seamless and efficient interface for administrators to manage and customize various aspects of the application.
Monitors the status of all scheduled and running batch jobs, providing real-time updates on progress, completion, and failures.

cardDetails.description: Configure, add, and manage all reference data within the application. It provides options to add new categories and add/update values to existing categories. Users can easily organize and update reference data as needed.

Configure, add, and manage new third-party services for use within the application. Additionally, users have the option to create new versions for existing services, enabling them to stay up to date with any changes or updates made to the services.
Configure, add, and manage country-specific information such as language, currency, companies, and marketing channels to the application for enhanced localization and customization.
Configure, add and manage new customer servicing units for integration with the Catalyst Customer Service Center (CSC) application.

Configure, add, and manage restrictions based on the product, standard coverage, or product class. Define maximum limits for standard coverage or set restrictions on the number of policies allowed for a given product or product class. This provides flexibility in establishing coverage and policy limitations, allowing for effective control and management within the application.
Configure, add, and manage insured individuals/objects for different product classes. This also enables the customization of pre-defined attributes for each insured type.
Configure, add, and manage product attributes for different product classes. This also enables the customization of pre-defined attributes for each insured.
Configure, add, and manage coverage variants which can be used in product configuration.
Configure, add, and manage standard coverage codes for downstream systems like Genius, Meridian, etc.
Configure, add, and manage banks that will be utilized for payment setup in the partner journey configuration.
Configure, add, and manage credit cards that will be utilized for payment setup in the partner journey configuration.
Configure, add, and manage collection agencies and its billing methods associated with various payment methods used in the partner journey configuration.

DEFAULT - Triggers matching fulfilments rules as configured. 
                        
 SUPPRESS ALL CORRESPONDENCE  Overrides rules; no documents or fulfillment generated.

It can also contain lowercase characters, numbers, and special characters (hyphen '-' or underscore '_' only) (i.e. 'eemg_api_test').
